characterabilities.name: Blood-Quenched

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Shield Guard. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

characterabilities.name: Side Step
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

feat.name: Defiance Of The Void
feat.description: While in Makeda's control range, friendly living models gain Retaliatory Strike. Additionally, when a friendly living warrior model in this model's control range is disabled, this model can suffer 1 damage point to remove 1 damage point from the disabled model. This damage cannot be transferred. Defiance of the Void lasts for one round. (If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by an enemy melee attack during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved it can immediately make one basic melee attack against the attacking model. A model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.)

execution.name: Primal Rage
execution.description: Once per turn, when this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance toward the attacking model and can make one basic melee attack.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Steady]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Steady. (A model with Steady cannot become knocked down.)

characterabilities.name: Team Effort
characterabilities.description: Once per game at any time during its unit's activation, this model can use Team Effort. This activation, models in this unit gain +2 to accuracy and damage rolls when making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in melee range of another model in this unit.

characterabilities.name: Combined Arms
characterabilities.description: When this model misses an accuracy roll for a combined ranged attack, it can reroll that accuracy roll. Each accuracy roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Combined Arms.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Venator Reivers]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Venator Reivers unit.

characterabilities.name: Extended Fire
characterabilities.description: This model can use Extended Fire once per game at any time during its unit’s activation. This activation, the ranged weapons of models in this unit gain Snipe. (An attack with a weapon with Snipe gains +4 RNG.)

characterabilities.name: Granted [Trained Fire]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Trained Fire. (A model with Trained Fire gains an additional die on ranged attack rolls against models within 8" of it.)

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Reposition 3". (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

ability.name: Volume Fire
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against medium-based models and +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Inspiration]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Inspiration. (A model with Inspiration gains +1 to attack accuracy rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Take Up
characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed, you can choose a trooper in this unit within 1” of it to be destroyed instead. Remove that trooper from the table instead of this model. This model has the same number of unmarked damage boxes as the chosen trooper.

characterabilities.name: Beast
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Medicate special actions as if it were a warbeast.

characterabilities.name: Building Rage
characterabilities.description: This model can forfeit its Combat Action to gain d3 rage tokens.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Greater Volume Fire
ability.description: Gain +2 to accuracy and damage rolls with this weapon against medium-based models and +3 to attack and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

ability.name: Independent Attack
ability.description: This attack has a base STR 6, base POW 5 and P+S 11. During its activation, this model can make its initial attacks with these weapons before it makes its Normal Movement.

ability.name: Knockdown
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Independent Attack
ability.description: This attack has a base STR 6, base POW 5 and P+S 11. During its activation, this model can make its initial attacks with these weapons before it makes its Normal Movement.

ability.name: Independent Attack
ability.description: This attack has a base STR 6, base POW 5 and P+S 11. During its activation, this model can make its initial attacks with these weapons before it makes its Normal Movement.

characterabilities.name: Defensive Strike
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy model advances into and ends its movement in this model’s melee range, this model can immediately make one basic melee attack against it.

characterabilities.name: Direct Spirits
characterabilities.description: When a friendly living Faction warrior model is destroyed in this model's Control Range and generates a soul token, you choose which model with a soul ability gains the destroyed model's soul, regardless of the proximity of other models. Enemy models are not eligible to gain soul tokens from friendly models destroyed in the model's Control Range.

characterabilities.name: Divine Inspiration
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on melee attack accuracy and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die of each roll.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [3 Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. This model can carry up to 3 soul tokens at any time.

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

characterabilities.name: Vault of the Faithful
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, you can remove up to three soul tokens from this model to return one destroyed small- or medium-based friendly Faction Grunt to play for each token removed. Grunts return with one unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model’s CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in its unit. Grunts must forfeit either their normal movement or Combat Action the turn they are returned to play.

topability.name: Gatekeeper
topability.description: This model gains soul tokens from living friendly Faction models that are destroyed while in this model's CMD range. This model can spend soul tokens for the following:

subabilities.name: Arcane Vortex
subabilities.description: This model can immediately negate any spell that targets it or a model within 3" of it by spending 1 focus/fury/essence. The negated spell does not take effect, but its COST remains spent.

subabilities.name: Soul-Powered
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action, this model can spend soul tokens to make additional melee attacks. It can make one additional attack for each token spent.

subabilities.name: Strength of Death
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action, this model can spend soul tokens to boost one accuracy or damage roll for each token spent.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.
